author: CBR
description:
The internet made comics more connected than ever, but the basics are still the basics. In this clip, Zub frames "Comic School" as a no-nonsense mindset: what to prioritize, how to think, and why the order matters. If you’re chasing a break-in roadmap, start here. 

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 4.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/rTl1KaQGa08
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg

#JimZub #Comics #ComicSchool #HeroesJourney

title: Jim Zub Reveals How to Actually Break Into Comics 🦸 #comics #JimZub #cbr #heroesjourney
